body:
@tgamblin @alalazo @becker33 I assume this is related to the recent merge of #3250.

If you look at the unit tests for #4568 you'll see a lot of unrelated unit tests failures in Travis. This PR simply adds a new package, so the unit tests should not be failing. Based on the error messages, I'm guessing there's a Python 3 byte incompatible thing we're doing when parsing modulecmd output.
title: test_get_module_cmd_fails failing in develop
